items.title: Russia still 'working with US' after Trump says he is 'angry' with Putin
items.description: In its first response to Trump's criticism of Putin, the Kremlin tried to play down the tensions between the two leaders.

items.title: Global shares slide as Trump tariffs loom
items.description: The US president suggests the new import taxes he is set to announce this week will hit all countries.

items.title: Red Cross outraged over killing of medics by Israeli forces in Gaza
items.description: Six Civil Defence first responders and a UN employee were also killed in the incident in Rafah on 23 March.

items.title: 'I feel guilty for not being in Myanmar  - our people need us the most now'
items.description: They fled war - now Myanmar's diaspora feel helpless watching their country struggle after the quake.

items.title: What caused the Myanmar earthquake - and why did it make a tower in Bangkok collapse?
items.description: The size of the earthquake and the length of the fault line it occurred on contributed to the devastation.
